definition: lit. although dead, as if still alive (idiom); still with us in spirit
lit. although dead, also honored; died a glorious death
although small, a steelyard weight may tip a hundred pounds (idiom)/apparently insignificant details can have a large impact/for want of a nail the battle was lost
pinyin: cheng4 tuo2 sui1 xiao3 ya1 qian1 jin1

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹雖好，全仗綠葉扶持

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 ping2 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹雖好，全憑綠葉扶持

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , zhong1 xu1 lu:4 ye4 fu2 chi2
containing_words.word: 牡丹雖好，終須綠葉扶持

definition: The sparrow may be small but all its vital organs are there (idiom)./small but complete in every detail
pinyin: ma2 que4 sui1 xiao3 , wu3 zang4 ju4 quan2

sentences.english: Why she’s a spicy dish: Shilpa has the best of intentions but trouble always seems to find her.
sentences.chinese: 希爾帕雖是一片好心，但麻煩總是找上她。

sentences.english: Middle-aged , he has never married and has a lecherous side.
sentences.chinese: 他雖已中年，但尚末娶妻，特別好色。

sentences.english: Although they are plays on words, the scholars can choose one or two of them.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲遊戲筆墨，但治學者或當有一二可取者耳。

sentences.english: The hard fut battle for recognition has been won, but it is by no means over.
sentences.chinese: 這場艱苦的女性能力認可戰雖已打贏，卻遠未終結。

sentences.english: Kneeling is not fall, but may be trampled.
sentences.chinese: 跪着雖不會跌倒，但可能被踐踏。

sentences.english: Though badly damaged by fire, the bus tried to make for its garage.
sentences.chinese: 這輛車雖被大火嚴重燒壞，仍努力開回車庫。

sentences.english: Concubinage is still the privilege of the rich class, but there still exist the phenomenon that the civilian concubinage.
sentences.chinese: 納妾雖屬於富貴階層的特權，但平民納妾也不在少數。

sentences.english: Although people going to follow, but also try to find a telephone.
sentences.chinese: 外出時雖有人跟隨，但也要想辦法找電話打。

sentences.english: The ship's orchestra's conductor stood to one side, looking peeved but apprehensive.
sentences.chinese: 艦隊的管弦樂團指揮站在一邊，面色雖慍怒但很知趣。
濟慈所作之詩雖簡潔卻不失爲壯麗。

sentences.english: It is also the real response of local architecture of Chu.
sentences.chinese: 雖浮想聯翩，亦不失爲楚鄉土建築實狀的反映。

sentences.english: It can be easily used with freshing touch, non greasy, protect the skin with favorable moisturizing effect.
sentences.chinese: 雖爲乳霜，卻出人意料地易於塗抹，觸感清爽不油膩。

sentences.english: But thou wast ever bravely meek.
sentences.chinese: 但你雖一向溫和卻很勇敢。

sentences.english: Although China and Saudi is thousands of kilometers away, the people in both countries have intercourse since long ago.
sentences.chinese: 中國和沙特雖相距數千公里，但兩國人民早有來往。

sentences.english: Memory is the hour of clothes, though no longer lares and useful.
sentences.chinese: 回憶是小時後的衣服，捨不得丟棄，雖已不再有用。

sentences.english: It was full of large fish, 153, but even with so many the net was not torn.
sentences.chinese: 魚雖這樣多，網卻沒有破。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
